words.source: H7760 (conjunction + Qal wayyiqtol 3mp); KJV 'Therefore they did set', ESV/NASB 'Therefore they set'
H5921 (preposition + 3ms suffix, collective reference); KJV/ESV/NASB 'over them'
H8269 (noun common masculine plural construct); KJV 'taskmasters', ESV 'taskmasters', NASB 'taskmasters'
H4522 (noun common masculine plural absolute); KJV 'taskmasters' (as one phrase with prev.), ESV 'taskmasters', NASB 'taskmasters' (lit. 'officers of forced-labor')
H4616 (preposition of purpose); KJV 'to', ESV 'to', NASB 'to'
H6031 (Piel infinitive construct + 3ms suffix, collective); KJV 'afflict them', ESV 'oppress them', NASB 'afflict them'
H5450 (preposition + noun common feminine plural construct + 3mp suffix); KJV 'with their burdens', ESV 'with heavy burdens', NASB 'with hard labor'
H1129 (conjunction + Qal wayyiqtol 3ms, collective subject); KJV 'And they built', ESV/NASB 'They built'
H5892 (noun common feminine plural construct); KJV/ESV/NASB 'cities'
H4543 (noun common feminine plural absolute); KJV 'treasure cities', ESV/NASB 'store cities'
H853 (definite direct object marker); untranslated in English
H853 (conjunction + definite direct object marker); untranslated in English except for the 'and'
